title: It looks like an arabic type of font. the closest one I could find was Palette, but it´s definitely not an option as a substitute.
content:
I found the text in a soap box.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180432im_/http:/typophile.com/files/IMG_4290_4965.JPG)

Font: 

 Legende

comments.content:
Legende, designed by Friedrich Schneidler for the Bauer Foundry in 1937:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/legende/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180432/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/legende/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/profonts/legende/")
